material_info:
This sun-dried red midi dress is trimmed with ribbon at the front placket and sleeves, with bias stitching to enhance the look.
Ribbon overlay.
Bias tiered design.
Round neck.
Balloon sleeves.
Buttoned cuffs.
Side pockets.
Flared skirt.
Button fastening at front.

Brand Ref: PW221DLS57-FCOU683 065
